title: Stadia Changelog: More family games are on the way as Cities: Skylines arrives
content:
Google Stadia has dates for a bunch of new family games coming to the platform, as it also added a huge classic this week.

description: Google Stadia this week locked in dates for six new family focused games from the DC, Dragons, and other franchises.
